content.title: Software engineer III - XP Inc.
content.caption: Created a document qrcode system to optimize the account opening process, reducing the time taken by users to upload their documents. Developed a BACEN validation system to ensure compliance with regulatory requirements during account opening.

content.title: Mid-level software developer - Santos Brasil
content.caption: Supported the development of the terminal's central weighbridge system. Contributed to improvements in the monitoring interface of the gate system and assisted with the implementation of this system in other units.

content.title: Junior software developer - Santos Brasil
content.caption: Collaborated closely with the operational gate team to develop the new gate system integrated with the new TOS (terminal operational system). Improved most features of the ship docking system.

content.caption: Developed a monitoring system that tracks most of company's RPAs. Worked together with my tutor and the operation team to develop the ship docking system, Berthwindow.
